DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : selfidentified comfortable speak Chinese ( Mandarin Cantonese ) first breast cancer diagnosis stag 0III complete primary treatment ( surgery , chemotherapy , radiotherapy ) within last 36 month Exclusion criterion : unable read speak Chinese ( Mandarin Cantonese ) breast cancer diagnosis stage IV live outside LA area
